code: import React from'react';import{Card,CardActions,CardContent,CardMedia,Button,Typography}from'@mui/material';import'../styles/productCard.css';import{addToCart}from'./storeSlice';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductCard(_ref){var product=_ref.product;var dispatch=useDispatch();function handleAddToCart(){dispatch(addToCart(product));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{variant:"outlined",className:"Card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",className:"card-image",image:product.image,alt:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{gutterBottom:true,variant:"body2",component:"div",children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"h5",color:"text.secondary",children:["$",product.price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardActions,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"card-button",size:"small",variant:"contained",onClick:function onClick(){return handleAddToCart();},children:"Add to cart"})})]});}export default ProductCard;
